occupation: Data Engineer @ FiftyFive Technologies | Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence
headline: Data Engineer @ FiftyFive Technologies | Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence
summary:
Hello, I'm Jayant Nehra, a dedicated Data Engineer with a solid background in building scalable data infrastructures, enhancing data integration, and deploying advanced data pipelines. With an MS in Artificial Intelligence from Warsaw University of Technology and extensive hands-on experience across high-tech industries, I specialize in transforming complex data challenges into actionable solutions.

In various environments, from startups to large enterprises, I have developed robust data pipelines that support real-time data processing and analytics. My technical toolkit is well-rounded, including Python, Golang, SQL, and big data technologies such as Apache Spark, PySpark, and Google BigQuery. I am particularly passionate about using cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and GCP to foster business insights and drive innovation.

Recently, I have been working on developing multilingual, multi-modal datasets for training proprietary large language models, involving sophisticated ETL pipelines and data curation strategies on Azure Data Lakes. My work focuses on ensuring efficient data operations on distributed systems, capable of processing up to 10 terabytes of data and enabling advanced NLP and machine learning applications.

I am committed to continuous learning and keeping up with industry trends, currently exploring cutting-edge data architecture technologies like Lakehouse, DBT, and Apache Iceberg. My goal is to leverage my analytical skills and technological acumen to help businesses transform data into strategic assets.

Let's Connect: I’m always open to discussing data engineering challenges and opportunities, or collaborating on projects that push the boundaries of data technology. Feel free to connect with me here on LinkedIn or drop me an email at nj.nehra@gmail.com to exchange ideas or explore potential synergies!

experiences.title: Data Engineer
experiences.description:
• Client ~ Run Viable - Financial Analyst Chatbot
    ◦ Key Contributions:
        ◦ Developed advanced financial analyst chatbot for dynamic and human-like interactions, boosting user satisfaction.
        ◦ Equipped chatbot with real-time Financial Insights, Intelligent Response Categorization, Dynamic Follow Up Question Analysis, and more.
        ◦ Automated query categorization and administrator control for accurate responses.
        ◦ Enabled chatbot to handle diverse financial queries with tailored response guidelines.

    ◦ Achievements:
        ◦ Enhanced User Satisfaction: Elevated user engagement and satisfaction through an interactive chatbot experience, leading to improved retention rates.
        ◦ Data-Driven Decision-Making: Provided Small Business owners with real-time access to financial insights, enabling informed and strategic decision-making.
        ◦ Streamlined User Interactions: Optimized user interactions by introducing dynamic follow-up questions, resulting in more accurate query resolutions.

    ◦ Technologies Used:
        ◦ Python, Google Cloud Databases, FastAPI
        ◦ Tools/Platforms: Heroku, Github, OpenAI API

• Client ~ LoopKitchen - Automated Delivery Intelligence
    ◦ Key Contributions:
        ◦ Developed KPI, Order Accuracy, Store Availability, and Item Performance modules for Store Insights.
        ◦ Streamlined third-party aggregator onboarding with a user-friendly self-serve system.
        ◦ Implemented real-time alerts for lost sales and facilitated brand optimization through operational quality measurement and marketing experiments.
        ◦ Optimized customer success workflows for better store availability and effective cancellations.

    ◦ Technologies Used:
        ◦ Languages: BigQuery, SQL, Python
        ◦ Tools/Platforms: Google BigQuery, Looker Studio, Github, Linear, Excel
